00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_XML_OARCHIVE_HPP
00003

00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/archive/detail/common_oarchive.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/tracking.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/serialization/string.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/mpl/assert.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00030 
00031 namespace boost {
00032 namespace archive {
00033 
00035 // class basic_xml_oarchive - write serialized objects to a xml output stream
00036 template<class Archive>
00037 class basic_xml_oarchive :
00038     public detail::common_oarchive<Archive>
00039 {
00040 protected:
00041 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00042 public:
00043 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00044     // for some inexplicable reason insertion of "class" generates compile erro
00045     // on msvc 7.1
00046     friend detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00047     friend class save_access;
00048 #else
00049     friend class detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00050     friend class save_access;
00051 #endif
00052     // special stuff for xml output
00053     unsigned int depth;
00054     bool indent_next;
00055     bool pending_preamble;
00056     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00057     indent();
00058     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00059     init();
00060     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00061     write_attribute(
00062         const char *attribute_name,
00063         int t,
00064         const char *conjunction = "=\""
00065     );
00066     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00067     write_attribute(
00068         const char *attribute_name,
00069         const char *key
00070     );
00071     // helpers used below
00072     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00073     save_start(const char *name);
00074     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00075     save_end(const char *name);
00076     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00077     end_preamble();
00078 
00079     // Anything not an attribute and not a name-value pair is an
00080     // error and should be trapped here.
00081     template<class T>
00082     void save_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int)
00083     {
00084         // If your program fails to compile here, its most likely due to
00085         // not specifying an nvp wrapper around the variable to
00086         // be serialized.
00087         BOOST_MPL_ASSERT((serialization::is_wrapper<T>));
00088         this->detail_common_oarchive::save_override(t, 0);
00089     }
00090 
00091    // special treatment for name-value pairs.
00092     typedef detail::common_oarchive<Archive> detail_common_oarchive;
00093     template<class T>
00094     void save_override(
00095         #ifndef BOOST_NO_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ORDERING
00096         const
00097         #endif
00098         ::boost::serialization::nvp<T> & t,
00099         int
00100     ){
00101         this->This()->save_start(t.name());
00102         this->detail_common_oarchive::save_override(t.const_value(), 0);
00103         this->This()->save_end(t.name());
00104     }
00105 
00106     // specific overrides for attributes - not name value pairs so we
00107     // want to trap them before the above "fall through"
00108     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00109     save_override(const object_id_type & t, int);
00110     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00111     save_override(const object_reference_type & t, int);
00112     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00113     save_override(const version_type & t, int);
00114     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00115     save_override(const class_id_type & t, int);
00116     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00117     save_override(const class_id_optional_type & t, int);
00118     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00119     save_override(const class_id_reference_type & t, int);
00120     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00121     save_override(const class_name_type & t, int);
00122     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00123     save_override(const tracking_type & t, int);
00124 
00125     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY())
00126     basic_xml_oarchive(unsigned int flags);
00127     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY())
00128     ~basic_xml_oarchive();
00129 };
00130 
00131 } // namespace archive
00132 } // namespace boost
00133 
00134 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00135 
00136 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_XML_OARCHIVE_HPP
